game.name: Bezel Project
game.desc: This utility will provide a downloader for Retroarach system bezel packs to be used for various systems within The-RA. This utility provides a download for a bezel pack for a system and includes a PNG bezel file for every ROM for that system. The download will also include the necessary configuration files needed for Retroarch to show them. The script will also update the required retroarch.cfg files for the emulators located in the /opt/retropie/configs directory. These changes are necessary to show the PNG bezels with an opacity of 1. Periodically, new bezel packs are completed and you will need to run the script updater to download the newest version to see these additional packs.

game.name: BGM Toggle
game.desc: Enable or disable the background music feature.

game.name: Bluetooth
game.desc: Register and connect to bluetooth devices. Unregister and remove devices, and display registered and connected devices.

game.name: Case Config
game.desc: Case image selector for OGST - choose the type of image displayed upon game launch such as console system, boxart, cartart, snap, wheel, screenshot, or marquee.

game.name: Case Themes
game.desc: Case theme selector for OGST - choose different theme packs when Console System is selected in Case Config.

game.name: Config Editor
game.desc: Change common RetroArch options, and manually edit RetroArch configs, global configs, and non-RetroArch configs.

game.name: Controller Reset
game.desc:
This will wipe out all controller configurations, and reset everything to factory default.
NOTE: This will cause your system to REBOOT.

game.name: ES Themes
game.desc: Install, uninstall, or update EmulationStation themes.

game.name: Fan Control
game.desc: Change the fan settings to control cooling and fan noise.

game.name: Fan Control 1 - Default
game.desc: To restore the fan to the factory Odroid settings select this option.

game.name: Fan Control 2 - Medium
game.desc:
To update the fan to the HIGHER COOLING RATE the factory Odroid settings select this option.
NOTE: PERFORM AT YOUR OWN RISK. NO IMPLIED WARRANTIES.

game.name: Fan Control 3 - Aggressive
game.desc:
To update the fan to the most AGGRESSIVE COOLING RATE compared to the factory Odroid settings select this option. The fan will become noticeably loud.
NOTE: PERFORM AT YOUR OWN RISK. NO IMPLIED WARRANTIES.

game.name: File Manager
game.desc:
Basic ascii file manager for linux allowing you to browse, copy, delete, and move files.
NOTE: Requires a keyboard to be connected.

game.name: Hursty's Themes
game.desc: Install, uninstall, or update RetroHursty69's EmulationStation themes. It also includes an ES bootup theme randomizer to automatically switch themes on bootup.

game.name: Odroid Config
game.desc:
OS and Hardware configurations such as: User Password, Boot Options, Internationalization, SSH, etc.
NOTE: This menu is EXPERIMENTAL. Use at your own risk and be sure to backup your image!

game.name: RetroArch
game.desc:
Launches the RetroArch GUI so you can change RetroArch options.
NOTE: Changes will not be saved unless you have enabled the "Save Configuration On Exit" option.

game.name: Run Command Config
game.desc: Change what appears on the runcommand screen. Enable or disable the menu, enable or disable box art, and change CPU configuration.

game.name: Show IP
game.desc: Displays your current IP address, as well as other information provided by the command, "ip addr show."

game.name: Splash Screens
game.desc: Enable or disable the splashscreen on The-RA boot. Choose a splashscreen, download new splashscreens, and return splashscreen to default.

game.name: Soft Reboot
game.desc:
Perform a soft reboot to recover local keyboard function if not functional.
NOTE: Typically only needed after exit from PSP games and there is a need to access the terminal by exit from EmulationStation.

game.name: System Info Utility
game.desc: View your CPU temps, IP connectivity, and storage to include external storage addons.

game.name: The-RA Setup
game.desc: Install The-RA from binary or source, install experimental packages, additional drivers, edit samba shares, custom scraper, as well as other related configurations.

game.name: Wi-Fi Setup
game.desc:
Connect to a wireless network.
NOTE: Requires a keyboard to be connected.
